item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.content:encoded:
I have to work Saturday, unfortunately. However, when I tried the link to SQL Saturday, I received the following error, despite having cookies enabled in my browser:

“The page isn’t redirecting properly
Firefox has detected that the server is redirecting the request for this address in a way that will never complete.
This problem can sometimes be caused by disabling or refusing to accept cookies.”
